title: Charlotte Merz: Age, Net Worth, Family & Career Highlights - Mabumbe
snippet: Charlotte Merz (née Gass), born in 1961 in Saarland, Germany, is a distinguished German judge and the wife of Friedrich Merz, the leader of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) and Germany’s Chancellor as of May 2025.

title: Charlotte Merz - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Charlotte Merz. Self: Inside CDU. Charlotte Merz was born in 1961 in Saarland, Germany. She has been married to Friedrich Merz since June 1981. They have three children.

title: FIS | Charlotte MERZ - Athlete Biography - Snowboard
snippet: FIS globally governs skiing and snowboarding and oversees over 7,000 events annually in Alpine, Cross-Country, Ski Jumping, Nordic Combined, Freestyle, Snowboard, and more.

title: Wife of would-be German chancellor only sees him on TV or Instagram
snippet: Charlotte Merz, the wife of the front-runner to become Germany's next chancellor, said on Friday she hardly sees her husband Friedrich during the ongoing election campaign, only catching glimpses of him on television or Instagram.
